Posts.Content: Hi Jo  I’m at the hospital as we speak getting checked  you are right best to be safe than sorry.  Thanks for your concern. I hoe you are feeling somewhat better now?.  Kind regards  Caroline
Posts.Title: help - what to do if i get a cold during chemo?

Posts.Content: Hi  I have just read the comments on cold symptoms and bad chest and sore throat. I’m due my third chemotherapy next Wednesday and have been suffering all those things for the last 3 days it’s worse at night I seem to cope better with it through the day. I’ve just been taking cocodamol which are hard to swallow as my throat feels like I’ve swallowed broken glass that’s the only way I can describe it.  I’m hoping by Tuesday when I get my bloods done it’s going to be a lot better I don’t want my chemotherapy delayed I just want to get the treatment over with my last of 6 will be jan then radiotherapy after that. I hope I’m doing the right thing just getting on with it by reading the comments it seems a common complaint during chemotherapy. Fingers crossed.
Posts.Title: help - what to do if i get a cold during chemo?
